strategy: Introduce a gradient boosting ensemble (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with tree-based features that incorporate interaction terms derived from categorical variable combinations, using a custom objective function that weights negative log-likelihood based on house size and location bins to better model price heterogeneity. Replace the deep neural network with this ensemble, leveraging tree-based model strengths in capturing non-linear interactions and robustness to outliers, while applying feature binning to stabilize gradients in high-value price ranges. Perform hyperparameter tuning using Bayesian optimization focused on R² maximization.
